title: Mobile-based Program for Enhancing Argumentative Scientific Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Scientific Theories and Experimental Methods, Awareness of Basic Writing Structures
context.additional_context: A program designed to systematically learn argumentative writing in an environment accessible only via smartphones. Emphasizes the process of constructing logical arguments based on scientific topics and iteratively incorporating feedback.

learning_goals: Learners construct three or more logical arguments and rebuttal-counter-rebuttal structures in science-related argumentative writing.
Learners perform a writing process achieving over 80% completeness in argument structure using the C-SAW tool.
Learners maintain over 90% accuracy in specialized terminology usage when writing arguments on scientific topics.
Learners experience at least three rounds of improvement in argumentative writing outcomes based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
